summary: This Registry file sets the command prompt settings, such as CodePage, FontFamily, FontWeight, FaceName, ScreenBufferSize, and WindowSize, for the current user under the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Console key.

details.comment: This Registry file sets the command prompt settings, such as CodePage, FontFamily, FontWeight, FaceName, ScreenBufferSize, and WindowSize, for the current user under the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Console key.
